channel.title: [508] ban command?
channel.description:
Can someone make me a ban,unban command for 508? ( bulby's source )
rep++ for help.

item.title: [508] ban command?
item.dc:creator: @Axed Axed
item.description:
@Axed wrote:

Put it in commands.java

Read full topic

item.title: [508] ban command?
item.dc:creator: @darklom darklom
item.description:
@darklom wrote:

[quote=“Axed, post:5, topic:253142”]Here it is.

else if (cmd[0].equals("banuser")) { String victim = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(victim)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.disconnected[0] = true; p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You have just Banned " + p2.username+"."); p2.appendToBanned(victim); p2.frames.showInterface(p2, 999999999); BufferedWriter bw = null; p.updateReq = true; p.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } }

if (cmd[0].equals("unban")) { String unbannedPlayer = playerCommand.substring(6); p.UnBanPlayer(unbannedPlayer); p.frames.sendMessage(p, "unbanned Player: "+playerCommand.substring(6)); BufferedWriter bw = null; p.updateReq = true; p.appearanceUpdateReq = true; }[/quote]

Were do i put this?

Read full topic

item.title: [508] ban command?
item.dc:creator: @Axed Axed
item.description:
@Axed wrote:

Here it is.

else if (cmd[0].equals("banuser")) { String victim = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(victim)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.disconnected[0] = true; p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You have just Banned " + p2.username+"."); p2.appendToBanned(victim); p2.frames.showInterface(p2, 999999999); BufferedWriter bw = null; p.updateReq = true; p.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } }

if (cmd[0].equals("unban")) { String unbannedPlayer = playerCommand.substring(6); p.UnBanPlayer(unbannedPlayer); p.frames.sendMessage(p, "unbanned Player: "+playerCommand.substring(6)); BufferedWriter bw = null; p.updateReq = true; p.appearanceUpdateReq = true; }

PUT IT IN COMMANDS.JAVA IF YOUR A NOOB!
